Craig School!","src":"IMG_2982.JPG?rnd=0.85777187666752","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"}]}}

span.p: Welcome to our new website! We hope you enjoy the new features that have been added. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at admin@moonachieschool.org.

span.a: Please Click Here For An Important Message Regarding Grading & Report Cards

a.title: Go to comments for Grading/Report Cards During Pandemic

strong.a: PLEASE CLICK HERE FOR GUIDELINES ON REGISTERING STUDENTS DURING THE CURRENT COVID-19 PANDEMIC.

a.title: Go to comments for Registration During COVID-19 Pandemic

span.p: Click on the links below for some great stress relievers.

span.a: RJWBarnabas Health offers suggestions on how to handle stress of COVID-19
NJ Mental Health offers a help-line. Feel free to call. Watch the video and read the article.
Coping with Stess of a Communicable Disease Outbreak-English
Coping with Stess During a Communicable Disease Outbreak-Spanish
Relaxation Activities to do at home with children

a.title: Go to comments for Stress Relievers for Parents
Go to comments for Virtual Spirit Week

span.a:
Please click here to get information about the school's Distance Learning Schedule effective Monday March 23, 2020.
Haga clic aquí para obtener información sobre el horario de aprendizaje a distancia de la escuela a partir del lunes 23 de marzo de 2020.

a.title: Go to comments for Distance Learning Schedules

div.p: There are no upcoming events to display.

span.p: It is the mission of the Robert L. Craig School to help its students achieve the New Jersey Core Curriculum Content Standards at all grade levels, and gain academic skills and knowledge, intellectual integrity, and individual courage as risk-takers, which will lead to their personal success. We will provide an education, which enables our students to operate as active citizens in America and in its democracy, as well as informed and concerned citizens of the world. This education will be provided in an atmosphere, which is disciplined and fosters respect for others by a dedicated teaching staff and administration who maintain a knowledge of contemporary teaching approaches and strategies.
